name: Klee
title: Fleeing Sunlight
intro: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

normalAttack.title: Favonius Bladework - Weiss
normalAttack.info:
Normal Attack

Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Charged Attack

Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time.

Plunging Attack

Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skill.title: Jumpy Dumpty
skill.info:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!

When thrown, Jumpy Dumptybounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.
On the third bounce, the bomb splits into 8 mines. The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
Starts with 2 charges.

burst.title: Sparks 'n' Splash
burst.info: Klee's Blazing Delight! For 10 seconds, summons 5 times 4 Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

passiveTalents.title: Sparkling Burst
passiveTalents.info: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

passiveTalents.title: All Of My Treasures!
passiveTalents.info: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.
